title: Font suggestion - "handmade" logo
content:
Hi.

I hope its appropriate to ask this question....

Do you have any font suggestions for a "makeover" of this "selfmade" logo ?

JohnM

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121031013726im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo-vert_6691.jpg)
author: JohnM

comments.content:
I like it the way it is, but if you're looking for that kinda stuff I'd check out House..

- Scott
